Models Documentation¶

class todolist.models.Task(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: Model

Model representing a task in the system.

This model stores information about tasks, including their title, status, the user who created the task, and the user to whom the task is assigned. The model also defines the behavior for what happens when a user associated with a task is deleted.

title¶

The title or name of the task.

Type:

CharField

status¶

The current status of the task, such as ‘todo’, ‘done’, or ‘in progress’.

Type:

CharField

user¶

The user who created the task. If the user is deleted, the task is also deleted (on_delete=models.CASCADE).

Type:

ForeignKey

assigned_to¶

The user to whom the task is assigned. If the assigned user is deleted, the assignment is set to NULL (on_delete=models.SET_NULL), but the task itself remains in the system.

Type:

ForeignKey

class Child(Model):

Child.parent is a ForwardManyToOneDescriptor instance.
